s.text: He arrived at a convenient time in the tobacco fight: He had no strong feelings about the evil weed, and he became the tobacco scourge only when Republican leaders asked him to shepherd the bill through the Senate.
It's why he's a great story and a great troublemaker.
It's why he's a great story and a great troublemaker.
It's why he's a great story and a great troublemaker.
(Bob Dole once said of him, "You spend five years in a box and you're entitled to speak your mind."
(Bob Dole once said of him, "You spend five years in a box and you're entitled to speak your mind."
It's easy to understand why McCain has been anointed the media's favorite presidential hopeful.

John McCain, who is allergic to their blandishments and threats, just as he is allergic to the cozy, sleazy compromises of this dark city, just as he is allergic to the mendacious hypocrisies of politics as it is practiced in late-20 th century America.
McCain benefits, too, from the general swoon about his history.
